Hello, I am Jac!

Currently, I am a Product Manager at BuzzFeed building tools to distribute content using data models and automation to drive audience and revenue growth. Previously, I worked as a design consultant guidling multinational companies, in-house teams, and startups to create impactful experience and products for news and games.

I also teach at the NYU Game Center.

Get in touch!

Recent works

BuzzFeed Internal Analytic Tools

Design, Research & Product

A suite of dashboards that empower 500+ editorial and business users to make data-driven decisions.

UX, UI & Product

A collection of digital toys to engage BuzzFeed’s mass audiences and draw brand partnership.

France TV Info
